00061 #define                 SECONDS_PER_COMPRESSION                               1 // 1/2 minute passes every 1 second of real time 
00062 #define                 SECONDS_PER_COMPRESSION_IN_RTCOMBAT             10
00063 #define                 SECONDS_PER_COMPRESSION_IN_TBCOMBAT             10
00064 #define                 CLOCK_STRING_HEIGHT                       13
00065 #define                 CLOCK_STRING_WIDTH                        66
00066 #define                 CLOCK_FONT                                      COMPFONT

00072 UINT8                   gubClockResolution                  = 1;
00073 BOOLEAN                 gfGamePaused                                    = TRUE;
00074 BOOLEAN                 gfTimeInterrupt                           = FALSE;

00080 UINT32                  guiTimesThisSecondProcessed = 0;

00107 void InitNewGameClock( )
00108 {
00109       guiGameClock = STARTING_TIME;
00110       guiPreviousGameClock = STARTING_TIME;
00111       guiDay = ( guiGameClock / NUM_SEC_IN_DAY );
00112       guiHour = ( guiGameClock - ( guiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY ) ) / NUM_SEC_IN_HOUR;
00113       guiMin      = ( guiGameClock - ( ( guiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY ) + ( guiHour * NUM_SEC_IN_HOUR ) ) ) / NUM_SEC_IN_MIN;
00114       swprintf( WORLDTIMESTR, L"%s %d, %02d:%02d", pDayStrings[ 0 ], guiDay, guiHour, guiMin );
00115       guiTimeCurrentSectorWasLastLoaded = 0;
00116       guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = 0;
00117       gubClockResolution = 1;
00118       memset( gubUnusedTimePadding, 0, TIME_PADDINGBYTES );
00119 }

00138 {
00139       return( ( guiHour * 60 ) + guiMin );

00142 UINT32 GetWorldDay( )

00147 UINT32 GetWorldDayInSeconds( )

00152 UINT32 GetWorldDayInMinutes( )
00153 {
00154       return( ( guiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY ) / NUM_SEC_IN_MIN ); 
00155 }

00157 UINT32 GetFutureDayInMinutes( UINT32 uiDay )
00158 {
00159       return( ( uiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY ) / NUM_SEC_IN_MIN ); 
00160 }

00162 //this function returns the amount of minutes there has been from start of game to midnight of the uiDay.  
00163 UINT32 GetMidnightOfFutureDayInMinutes( UINT32 uiDay )
00164 {
00165       return( GetWorldTotalMin() + ( uiDay * 1440 ) - GetWorldMinutesInDay( ) ); 
00166 }

00168 // Not to be used too often by things other than internally
00169 void WarpGameTime( UINT32 uiAdjustment, UINT8 ubWarpCode )
00170 {
00171       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"WarpGameTime");
00172 
00173       UINT32 uiSaveTimeRate;
00174       uiSaveTimeRate = guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond;
00175       guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = uiAdjustment;
00176       AdvanceClock( ubWarpCode );
00177       guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = uiSaveTimeRate;
00178 
00179       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"WarpGameTime done");
00180 }
00181 
00182 
00183 void AdvanceClock( UINT8 ubWarpCode )
00184 {
00185       UINT32 uiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond;
00186 
00187       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"AdvanceClock");
00188 
00189 
00190       // Set value, to different things if we are in combat...
00191       if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00192       {
00193             if ( (gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED) )
00194             {
00195                   uiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = SECONDS_PER_COMPRESSION_IN_TBCOMBAT;
00196             }
00197             else
00198             {
00199                   uiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = SECONDS_PER_COMPRESSION_IN_RTCOMBAT;
00200             }
00201       }
00202 
00203       if( ubWarpCode != WARPTIME_NO_PROCESSING_OF_EVENTS )
00204       {
00205             guiTimeOfLastEventQuery = guiGameClock;
00206             //First of all, events are posted for movements, pending attacks, equipment arrivals, etc.  This time 
00207             //adjustment using time compression can possibly pass one or more events in a single pass.  So, this list
00208             //is looked at and processed in sequential order, until the uiAdjustment is fully applied.
00209             if( GameEventsPending( guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond ) )
00210             {
00211                   //If a special event, justifying the cancellation of time compression is reached, the adjustment
00212                   //will be shortened to the time of that event, and will stop processing events, otherwise, all
00213                   //of the events in the time slice will be processed.  The time is adjusted internally as events
00214                   //are processed.
00215                   ProcessPendingGameEvents( guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond, ubWarpCode );
00216             }
00217             else
00218             {
00219                   //Adjust the game clock now.
00220                   guiGameClock += guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond;
00221             }
00222       }
00223       else
00224       {
00225             guiGameClock += guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond;
00226       }
00227 
00228 
00229       if ( guiGameClock < guiPreviousGameClock )
00230       {
00231             AssertMsg( FALSE, String( "AdvanceClock: TIME FLOWING BACKWARDS!!! guiPreviousGameClock %d, now %d", guiPreviousGameClock, guiGameClock ) );
00232 
00233             // fix it if assertions are disabled
00234             guiGameClock = guiPreviousGameClock;
00235       }
00236 
00237       // store previous game clock value (for error-checking purposes only)
00238       guiPreviousGameClock = guiGameClock;
00239 
00240 
00241       //Calculate the day, hour, and minutes.
00242       guiDay = ( guiGameClock / NUM_SEC_IN_DAY );
00243       guiHour = ( guiGameClock - ( guiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY ) ) / NUM_SEC_IN_HOUR;
00244       guiMin      = ( guiGameClock - ( ( guiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY ) + ( guiHour * NUM_SEC_IN_HOUR ) ) ) / NUM_SEC_IN_MIN;
00245 
00246       swprintf( WORLDTIMESTR, L"%s %d, %02d:%02d", gpGameClockString[ STR_GAMECLOCK_DAY_NAME ], guiDay, guiHour, guiMin );
00247 
00248       if( gfResetAllPlayerKnowsEnemiesFlags && !gTacticalStatus.fEnemyInSector )
00249       {
00250             ClearAnySectorsFlashingNumberOfEnemies();
00251 
00252             gfResetAllPlayerKnowsEnemiesFlags = FALSE;
00253       }
00254 
00255       ForecastDayEvents( );
00256 
00257       DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"AdvanceClock done");
00258 }
00259 
00260 
00261 void AdvanceToNextDay()
00262 {
00263       INT32  uiDiff;
00264       UINT32 uiTomorrowTimeInSec;
00265       
00266       uiTomorrowTimeInSec = (guiDay+1)*NUM_SEC_IN_DAY + 8*NUM_SEC_IN_HOUR + 15*NUM_SEC_IN_MIN;
00267       uiDiff = uiTomorrowTimeInSec - guiGameClock;
00268       WarpGameTime( uiDiff, WARPTIME_PROCESS_EVENTS_NORMALLY );
00269 
00270       ForecastDayEvents( );
00271 }

00297 void RenderClock( INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
00298 {
00299       SetFont( CLOCK_FONT );
00300       SetFontBackground( FONT_MCOLOR_BLACK );
00301 
00302 #ifdef CRIPPLED_VERSION
00303       if( guiDay >= 8 )
00304       {
00305             SetFontForeground( FONT_FCOLOR_NICERED );
00306             // Erase first!
00307             RestoreExternBackgroundRect(sX, sY, CLOCK_STRING_WIDTH, CLOCK_STRING_HEIGHT );
00308             swprintf( gswzWorldTimeStr, L"GAME OVER" );
00309             mprintf( sX + (CLOCK_STRING_WIDTH - StringPixLength( WORLDTIMESTR, CLOCK_FONT ))/2, sY, WORLDTIMESTR );
00310             return;
00311       }
00312 #endif
00313 
00314       // Are we in combat?
00315       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
00316       {
00317             SetFontForeground( FONT_FCOLOR_NICERED );
00318       }
00319       else
00320       {
00321             SetFontForeground( FONT_LTGREEN );
00322       }
00323 
00324       // Erase first!
00325       RestoreExternBackgroundRect(sX, sY, CLOCK_STRING_WIDTH, CLOCK_STRING_HEIGHT );
00326       
00327       if( ( gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause == FALSE ) )
00328       {
00329             mprintf( sX + (CLOCK_STRING_WIDTH - StringPixLength( WORLDTIMESTR, CLOCK_FONT ))/2, sY, WORLDTIMESTR );
00330       }
00331       else
00332       {
00333             mprintf( sX + (CLOCK_STRING_WIDTH - StringPixLength( pPausedGameText[ 0 ], CLOCK_FONT ))/2, sY, pPausedGameText[ 0 ] );
00334       }
00335 
00336 }

00338 
00339 void ToggleSuperCompression()
00340 {
00341       static UINT32 uiOldTimeCompressMode = 0;
00342 
00343       // Display message
00344       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT )
00345       {
00346             //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Cannot toggle compression in Combat Mode."  );
00347             return;
00348       }
00349 
00350       fSuperCompression = (BOOLEAN)(!fSuperCompression);
00351 
00352       if ( fSuperCompression )
00353       {
00354             uiOldTimeCompressMode = giTimeCompressMode;
00355             giTimeCompressMode            = TIME_SUPER_COMPRESS;
00356             guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = giTimeCompressSpeeds[ giTimeCompressMode ] * SECONDS_PER_COMPRESSION;
00357 
00358             //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Time compression ON."  );
00359       }
00360       else
00361       {
00362             giTimeCompressMode            = uiOldTimeCompressMode;
00363             guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = giTimeCompressSpeeds[ giTimeCompressMode ] * SECONDS_PER_COMPRESSION;
00364 
00365             //ScreenMsg( MSG_FONT_YELLOW, MSG_INTERFACE, L"Time compression OFF."  );
00366       }
00367 }

00378 
00379 void StopTimeCompression( void )
00380 {
00381       if ( gfTimeCompressionOn )
00382       {
00383             // change the clock resolution to no time passage, but don't actually change the compress mode (remember it)
00384             SetClockResolutionToCompressMode( TIME_COMPRESS_X0 );
00385       }
00386 }
00387 
00388 
00389 void StartTimeCompression( void )
00390 {
00391        DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"StartTimeCompression");
00392 
00393       if ( !gfTimeCompressionOn )
00394       {
00395             if ( GamePaused() )
00396             {
00397                   // first have to be allowed to unpause the game
00398                   UnPauseGame( );
00399 
00400                   // if we couldn't, ignore this request
00401                   if ( GamePaused() )
00402                   {
00403                         return;
00404                   }
00405             }
00406 
00407 
00408             // check that we can start compressing
00409             if ( !AllowedToTimeCompress( ) )
00410             {
00411                   // not allowed to compress time
00412                   TellPlayerWhyHeCantCompressTime();
00413                   return;
00414             }
00415 
00416 
00417             // if no compression mode is set, increase it first
00418             if ( giTimeCompressMode <= TIME_COMPRESS_X1 )
00419             {
00420                   IncreaseGameTimeCompressionRate();
00421             }
00422 
00423             // change clock resolution to the current compression mode
00424             SetClockResolutionToCompressMode( giTimeCompressMode );
00425 
00426             // if it's the first time we're doing this since entering map screen (which reset the flag)
00427             if ( !HasTimeCompressOccured( ) )
00428             {
00429                   // set fact that we have compressed time during this map screen session
00430                   SetFactTimeCompressHasOccured( );
00431 
00432                   ClearTacticalStuffDueToTimeCompression( );
00433             }
00434       }
00435 }
00436 
00437 
00438 // returns FALSE if time isn't currently being compressed for ANY reason (various pauses, etc.)
00439 BOOLEAN IsTimeBeingCompressed( void )
00440 {
00441       if( !gfTimeCompressionOn || ( giTimeCompressMode == TIME_COMPRESS_X0 ) || gfGamePaused )
00442             return( FALSE );
00443       else
00444             return ( TRUE );
00445 }
00446 
00447 
00448 // returns TRUE if the player currently doesn't want time to be compressing
00449 BOOLEAN IsTimeCompressionOn( void )
00450 {
00451       return( gfTimeCompressionOn );
00452 }
00453 
00454 
00455 void IncreaseGameTimeCompressionRate( )
00456 {
00457       // if not already at maximum time compression rate
00458       if( giTimeCompressMode < TIME_COMPRESS_60MINS )
00459       {
00460             // check that we can
00461             if ( !AllowedToTimeCompress( ) )
00462             {
00463                   // not allowed to compress time
00464                   TellPlayerWhyHeCantCompressTime();
00465                   return;
00466             }
00467 
00468 
00469             giTimeCompressMode++;
00470 
00471             // in map screen, we wanna have to skip over x1 compression and go straight to 5x
00472             if( ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) && ( giTimeCompressMode == TIME_COMPRESS_X1 ) )
00473             {
00474                   giTimeCompressMode++;
00475             }
00476 
00477             SetClockResolutionToCompressMode( giTimeCompressMode );
00478       }
00479 }
00480 
00481 
00482 void DecreaseGameTimeCompressionRate()
00483 {
00484       // if not already at minimum time compression rate
00485       if( giTimeCompressMode > TIME_COMPRESS_X0 )
00486       {
00487             // check that we can
00488             if ( !AllowedToTimeCompress( ) )
00489             {
00490                   // not allowed to compress time
00491                   TellPlayerWhyHeCantCompressTime();
00492                   return;
00493             }
00494 
00495             giTimeCompressMode--;
00496 
00497             // in map screen, we wanna have to skip over x1 compression and go straight to 5x
00498             if( ( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN ) && ( giTimeCompressMode == TIME_COMPRESS_X1 ) )
00499             {
00500                   giTimeCompressMode--;
00501             }
00502 
00503             SetClockResolutionToCompressMode( giTimeCompressMode );
00504       }
00505 }
00506 
00507 
00508 void SetGameTimeCompressionLevel( UINT32 uiCompressionRate )
00509 {
00510       Assert( uiCompressionRate < NUM_TIME_COMPRESS_SPEEDS );
00511 
00512       if( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
00513       {
00514             if( uiCompressionRate != TIME_COMPRESS_X1 )
00515             {
00516                   uiCompressionRate = TIME_COMPRESS_X1;
00517             }
00518       }
00519 
00520       if( guiCurrentScreen == MAP_SCREEN )
00521       {
00522             if( uiCompressionRate == TIME_COMPRESS_X1 )
00523             {
00524                   uiCompressionRate = TIME_COMPRESS_X0;
00525             }
00526       }
00527 
00528       // if we're attempting time compression
00529       if ( uiCompressionRate >= TIME_COMPRESS_5MINS )
00530       {
00531             // check that we can
00532             if ( !AllowedToTimeCompress( ) )
00533             {
00534                   // not allowed to compress time
00535                   TellPlayerWhyHeCantCompressTime();
00536                   return;
00537             }
00538       }
00539 
00540       giTimeCompressMode = uiCompressionRate;
00541       SetClockResolutionToCompressMode( giTimeCompressMode );
00542 }
00543 
00544 
00545 void SetClockResolutionToCompressMode( INT32 iCompressMode )
00546 {
00547       guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = giTimeCompressSpeeds[ iCompressMode ] * SECONDS_PER_COMPRESSION;
00548 
00549       // ok this is a bit confusing, but for time compression (e.g. 30x60) we want updates
00550       // 30x per second, but for standard unpaused time, like in tactical, we want 1x per second
00551       if ( guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond == 0 )
00552       {
00553             SetClockResolutionPerSecond( 0 );
00554       }
00555       else
00556       {
00557             SetClockResolutionPerSecond( (UINT8) max( 1, (UINT8)(guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond / 60) ) );
00558       }
00559 
00560       // if the compress mode is X0 or X1
00561       if ( iCompressMode <= TIME_COMPRESS_X1 )
00562       {
00563             gfTimeCompressionOn = FALSE;
00564       }
00565       else
00566       {
00567             gfTimeCompressionOn = TRUE;
00568 
00569             // handle the player just starting a game
00570             HandleTimeCompressWithTeamJackedInAndGearedToGo( );
00571       }
00572 
00573       fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00574 }
00575 
00576 
00577 
00578 void SetGameHoursPerSecond( UINT32 uiGameHoursPerSecond )
00579 {
00580       giTimeCompressMode = NOT_USING_TIME_COMPRESSION;
00581       guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = uiGameHoursPerSecond * 3600;
00582       if( uiGameHoursPerSecond == 1 )
00583       {
00584             SetClockResolutionPerSecond( 60 );
00585       }
00586       else
00587       {
00588             SetClockResolutionPerSecond( 59 );
00589       }
00590 }
00591 
00592 void SetGameMinutesPerSecond( UINT32 uiGameMinutesPerSecond )
00593 {
00594       giTimeCompressMode = NOT_USING_TIME_COMPRESSION;
00595       guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = uiGameMinutesPerSecond * 60;
00596       SetClockResolutionPerSecond( (UINT8)uiGameMinutesPerSecond );
00597 }
00598 
00599 void SetGameSecondsPerSecond( UINT32 uiGameSecondsPerSecond )
00600 {
00601       giTimeCompressMode = NOT_USING_TIME_COMPRESSION;
00602       guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond = uiGameSecondsPerSecond;
00603 //    SetClockResolutionPerSecond( (UINT8)(guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond / 60) );
00604       if ( guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond == 0 )
00605       {
00606             SetClockResolutionPerSecond( 0 );
00607       }
00608       else
00609       {
00610             SetClockResolutionPerSecond( (UINT8) max( 1, (UINT8)(guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond / 60) ) );
00611       }
00612 
00613 }

00616 // call this to prevent player from changing the time compression state via the interface
00617 
00618 void LockPauseState( UINT32 uiUniqueReasonId )
00619 {
00620       gfLockPauseState = TRUE;
00621 
00622       // if adding a new call, please choose a new uiUniqueReasonId, this helps track down the cause when it's left locked
00623       // Highest # used was 21 on Feb 15 '99.
00624       // Madd - Highest # used is 22.
00625       guiLockPauseStateLastReasonId = uiUniqueReasonId;
00626 }
00627 
00628 // call this to allow player to change the time compression state via the interface once again
00629 void UnLockPauseState()
00630 {
00631       gfLockPauseState = FALSE;
00632 }
00633 
00634 // tells you whether the player is currently locked out from messing with the time compression state
00635 BOOLEAN PauseStateLocked()
00636 {
00637       return gfLockPauseState;
00638 }
00639 
00640 
00641 void PauseGame()
00642 {
00643       // always allow pausing, even if "locked".  Locking applies only to trying to compress time, not to pausing it
00644       if( !gfGamePaused )
00645       {
00646             gfGamePaused = TRUE;
00647             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00648       }
00649 }
00650 
00651 void UnPauseGame()
00652 {
00653       // if we're paused
00654       if( gfGamePaused )
00655       {
00656             // ignore request if locked
00657             if ( gfLockPauseState )
00658             {
00659                   ScreenMsg( FONT_ORANGE, MSG_TESTVERSION, L"Call to UnPauseGame() while Pause State is LOCKED! AM-4" );
00660                   return;
00661             }
00662 
00663             gfGamePaused = FALSE;
00664             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
00665       }
00666 }
00667 
00668 
00669 void TogglePause()
00670 {
00671       if ( gfGamePaused )
00672       {
00673             UnPauseGame();
00674       }
00675       else
00676       {
00677             PauseGame();
00678       }
00679 }
00680 
00681 
00682 BOOLEAN GamePaused()
00683 {
00684       return gfGamePaused;
00685 }
00686 
00687 
00688 //ONLY APPLICABLE INSIDE EVENT CALLBACKS!
00689 void InterruptTime()
00690 {
00691       gfTimeInterrupt = TRUE;
00692 }
00693 
00694 void PauseTimeForInterupt()
00695 {
00696       gfTimeInterruptPause = TRUE;
00697 }
00698 
00699 //USING CLOCK RESOLUTION
00700 //Note, that changing the clock resolution doesn't effect the amount of game time that passes per
00701 //real second, but how many times per second the clock is updated.  This rate will break up the actual
00702 //time slices per second into smaller chunks.  This is useful for animating strategic movement under
00703 //fast time compression, so objects don't warp around.
00704 void SetClockResolutionToDefault()
00705 {
00706       gubClockResolution = 1;
00707 }
00708 
00709 //Valid range is 0 - 60 times per second.
00710 void SetClockResolutionPerSecond( UINT8 ubNumTimesPerSecond )
00711 {
00712       ubNumTimesPerSecond = (UINT8)(max( 0, min( 60, ubNumTimesPerSecond ) ));
00713       gubClockResolution = ubNumTimesPerSecond;
00714 }
00715 
00716 //Function for accessing the current rate
00717 UINT8 ClockResolution()
00718 {
00719       return gubClockResolution;
00720 }
00721 
00722 
00723 //There are two factors that influence the flow of time in the game.
00724 //-Speed:  The speed is the amount of game time passes per real second of time.  The higher this
00725 //         value, the faster the game time flows.
00726 //-Resolution:  The higher the resolution, the more often per second the clock is actually updated.
00727 //                       This value doesn't affect how much game time passes per real second, but allows for
00728 //                       a more accurate representation of faster time flows.
00729 void UpdateClock()
00730 {
00731       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"UpdateClock");
00732 
00733       UINT32 uiNewTime;
00734       UINT32 uiThousandthsOfThisSecondProcessed;
00735       UINT32 uiTimeSlice;
00736       UINT32 uiNewTimeProcessed;
00737       UINT32 uiAmountToAdvanceTime;
00738       static UINT8 ubLastResolution = 1;
00739       static UINT32 uiLastSecondTime = 0;
00740       static UINT32 uiLastTimeProcessed = 0;
00741 #ifdef DEBUG_GAME_CLOCK
00742       UINT32 uiOrigNewTime;
00743       UINT32 uiOrigLastSecondTime;
00744       UINT32 uiOrigThousandthsOfThisSecondProcessed;
00745       UINT8 ubOrigClockResolution;
00746       UINT32 uiOrigTimesThisSecondProcessed;
00747       UINT8 ubOrigLastResolution;
00748 #endif
00749       // check game state for pause screen masks
00750       CreateDestroyScreenMaskForPauseGame( );
00751 
00752 #ifdef JA2BETAVERSION
00753       if( guiCurrentScreen != GAME_SCREEN && guiCurrentScreen != MAP_SCREEN && guiCurrentScreen != AIVIEWER_SCREEN && guiCurrentScreen != GAME_SCREEN )
00754 #else
00755       if( guiCurrentScreen != GAME_SCREEN && guiCurrentScreen != MAP_SCREEN && guiCurrentScreen != GAME_SCREEN )
00756 #endif
00757       {
00758             uiLastSecondTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00759             gfTimeInterruptPause = FALSE;
00760             return;
00761       }
00762 
00763       if( gfGamePaused || gfTimeInterruptPause || ( gubClockResolution == 0 ) || !guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond || ARE_IN_FADE_IN( ) || gfFadeOut )
00764       {
00765             uiLastSecondTime = GetJA2Clock( );
00766             gfTimeInterruptPause = FALSE;
00767             return;
00768       }
00769 
00770       if( ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & TURNBASED && gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & INCOMBAT ) )
00771             return; //time is currently stopped!
00772 
00773 
00774       uiNewTime = GetJA2Clock();
00775 
00776 #ifdef DEBUG_GAME_CLOCK
00777       uiOrigNewTime = uiNewTime;
00778       uiOrigLastSecondTime = uiLastSecondTime;
00779       uiOrigThousandthsOfThisSecondProcessed = uiThousandthsOfThisSecondProcessed;
00780       ubOrigClockResolution = gubClockResolution;
00781       uiOrigTimesThisSecondProcessed = guiTimesThisSecondProcessed;
00782       ubOrigLastResolution = ubLastResolution;
00783 #endif
00784 
00785       //Because we debug so much, breakpoints tend to break the game, and cause unnecessary headaches.
00786       //This line ensures that no more than 1 real-second passes between frames.  This otherwise has
00787       //no effect on anything else.
00788       uiLastSecondTime = max( uiNewTime - 1000, uiLastSecondTime );
00789 
00790       //1000's of a second difference since last second.
00791       uiThousandthsOfThisSecondProcessed = uiNewTime - uiLastSecondTime;
00792 
00793       if( uiThousandthsOfThisSecondProcessed >= 1000 && gubClockResolution == 1 )
00794       {
00795             uiLastSecondTime = uiNewTime;
00796             guiTimesThisSecondProcessed = uiLastTimeProcessed = 0;
00797             AdvanceClock( WARPTIME_PROCESS_EVENTS_NORMALLY ); 
00798       }
00799       else if( gubClockResolution > 1 )
00800       {
00801             if( gubClockResolution != ubLastResolution )
00802             {
00803                   //guiTimesThisSecondProcessed = guiTimesThisSecondProcessed * ubLastResolution / gubClockResolution % gubClockResolution;
00804                   guiTimesThisSecondProcessed = guiTimesThisSecondProcessed * gubClockResolution / ubLastResolution;
00805                   uiLastTimeProcessed = uiLastTimeProcessed * gubClockResolution / ubLastResolution;
00806                   ubLastResolution = gubClockResolution;
00807             }
00808             uiTimeSlice = 1000000/gubClockResolution;
00809             if( uiThousandthsOfThisSecondProcessed >= uiTimeSlice * (guiTimesThisSecondProcessed+1)/1000 )
00810             {
00811                   guiTimesThisSecondProcessed = uiThousandthsOfThisSecondProcessed*1000 / uiTimeSlice;
00812                   uiNewTimeProcessed = guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond * guiTimesThisSecondProcessed / gubClockResolution;
00813 
00814                   uiNewTimeProcessed = max( uiNewTimeProcessed, uiLastTimeProcessed );
00815 
00816                   uiAmountToAdvanceTime = uiNewTimeProcessed - uiLastTimeProcessed;
00817 
00818                   #ifdef DEBUG_GAME_CLOCK
00819                         if( uiAmountToAdvanceTime > 0x80000000 || guiGameClock + uiAmountToAdvanceTime < guiPreviousGameClock )
00820                         {
00821                               uiNewTimeProcessed = uiNewTimeProcessed;
00822                         }
00823                   #endif
00824 
00825                   WarpGameTime( uiNewTimeProcessed - uiLastTimeProcessed, WARPTIME_PROCESS_EVENTS_NORMALLY );
00826                   if( uiNewTimeProcessed < guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond )
00827                   { //Processed the same real second
00828                         uiLastTimeProcessed =  uiNewTimeProcessed;
00829                   }
00830                   else
00831                   { //We have moved into a new real second.
00832                         uiLastTimeProcessed = uiNewTimeProcessed % guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond;
00833                         if ( gubClockResolution > 0 )
00834                         {
00835                               guiTimesThisSecondProcessed %= gubClockResolution;
00836                         }
00837                         else
00838                         {
00839                               // this branch occurs whenever an event during WarpGameTime stops time compression!
00840                               guiTimesThisSecondProcessed = 0;
00841                         }
00842                         uiLastSecondTime = uiNewTime;
00843                   }
00844             }
00845       }
00846       //DebugMsg (TOPIC_JA2,DBG_LEVEL_3,"UpdateClock done");
00847 }
00848

00851 BOOLEAN SaveGameClock( HWFILE hFile, BOOLEAN fGamePaused, BOOLEAN fLockPauseState )
00852 {
00853       UINT32      uiNumBytesWritten=0;
00854 
00855       FileWrite( hFile, &giTimeCompressMode, sizeof( INT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00856       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( INT32 ) )
00857             return(FALSE);
00858 
00859       FileWrite( hFile, &gubClockResolution, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00860       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
00861             return(FALSE);
00862 
00863       FileWrite( hFile, &fGamePaused, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00864       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00865             return(FALSE);
00866 
00867       FileWrite( hFile, &gfTimeInterrupt, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00868       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00869             return(FALSE);
00870 
00871       FileWrite( hFile, &fSuperCompression, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00872       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00873             return(FALSE);
00874 
00875       FileWrite( hFile, &guiGameClock, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00876       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00877             return(FALSE);
00878 
00879       FileWrite( hFile, &guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00880       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00881             return(FALSE);
00882 
00883       FileWrite( hFile, &ubAmbientLightLevel, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00884       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
00885             return(FALSE);
00886 
00887       FileWrite( hFile, &guiEnvTime, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00888       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00889             return(FALSE);
00890 
00891       FileWrite( hFile, &guiEnvDay, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00892       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00893             return(FALSE);
00894 
00895       FileWrite( hFile, &gubEnvLightValue, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00896       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
00897             return(FALSE);
00898 
00899       FileWrite( hFile, &guiTimeOfLastEventQuery, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00900       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00901             return(FALSE);
00902 
00903       FileWrite( hFile, &fLockPauseState, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00904       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00905             return(FALSE);
00906 
00907       FileWrite( hFile, &gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00908       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00909             return(FALSE);
00910 
00911       FileWrite( hFile, &gfResetAllPlayerKnowsEnemiesFlags, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00912       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00913             return(FALSE);
00914 
00915       FileWrite( hFile, &gfTimeCompressionOn, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00916       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00917             return(FALSE);
00918 
00919       FileWrite( hFile, &guiPreviousGameClock, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00920       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00921             return(FALSE);
00922 
00923       FileWrite( hFile, &guiLockPauseStateLastReasonId, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesWritten );
00924       if( uiNumBytesWritten != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00925             return(FALSE);
00926 
00927 
00928       FileWrite( hFile, gubUnusedTimePadding, TIME_PADDINGBYTES, &uiNumBytesWritten );
00929       if( uiNumBytesWritten != TIME_PADDINGBYTES )
00930             return(FALSE);
00931       return( TRUE );
00932 }

00934 
00935 BOOLEAN LoadGameClock( HWFILE hFile )
00936 {
00937       UINT32      uiNumBytesRead;
00938 
00939       FileRead( hFile, &giTimeCompressMode, sizeof( INT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00940       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( INT32 ) )
00941             return(FALSE);
00942 
00943       FileRead( hFile, &gubClockResolution, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00944       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
00945             return(FALSE);
00946 
00947       FileRead( hFile, &gfGamePaused, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00948       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00949             return(FALSE);
00950 
00951       FileRead( hFile, &gfTimeInterrupt, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00952       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00953             return(FALSE);
00954 
00955       FileRead( hFile, &fSuperCompression, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00956       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00957             return(FALSE);
00958 
00959       FileRead( hFile, &guiGameClock, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00960       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00961             return(FALSE);
00962 
00963       FileRead( hFile, &guiGameSecondsPerRealSecond, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00964       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00965             return(FALSE);
00966 
00967       FileRead( hFile, &ubAmbientLightLevel, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00968       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
00969             return(FALSE);
00970 
00971       FileRead( hFile, &guiEnvTime, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00972       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00973             return(FALSE);
00974 
00975       FileRead( hFile, &guiEnvDay, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00976       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00977             return(FALSE);
00978 
00979       FileRead( hFile, &gubEnvLightValue, sizeof( UINT8 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00980       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT8 ) )
00981             return(FALSE);
00982 
00983       FileRead( hFile, &guiTimeOfLastEventQuery, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00984       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
00985             return(FALSE);
00986 
00987       FileRead( hFile, &gfLockPauseState, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00988       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00989             return(FALSE);
00990 
00991       FileRead( hFile, &gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00992       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00993             return(FALSE);
00994 
00995       FileRead( hFile, &gfResetAllPlayerKnowsEnemiesFlags, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesRead );
00996       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
00997             return(FALSE);
00998 
00999       FileRead( hFile, &gfTimeCompressionOn, sizeof( BOOLEAN ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01000       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( BOOLEAN ) )
01001             return(FALSE);
01002 
01003       FileRead( hFile, &guiPreviousGameClock, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01004       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
01005             return(FALSE);
01006 
01007       FileRead( hFile, &guiLockPauseStateLastReasonId, sizeof( UINT32 ), &uiNumBytesRead );
01008       if( uiNumBytesRead != sizeof( UINT32 ) )
01009             return(FALSE);
01010 
01011 
01012       FileRead( hFile, gubUnusedTimePadding, TIME_PADDINGBYTES, &uiNumBytesRead );
01013       if( uiNumBytesRead != TIME_PADDINGBYTES )
01014             return(FALSE);
01015 
01016 
01017       //Update the game clock
01018       guiDay = ( guiGameClock / NUM_SEC_IN_DAY );
01019       guiHour = ( guiGameClock - ( guiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY ) ) / NUM_SEC_IN_HOUR;
01020       guiMin      = ( guiGameClock - ( ( guiDay * NUM_SEC_IN_DAY ) + ( guiHour * NUM_SEC_IN_HOUR ) ) ) / NUM_SEC_IN_MIN;
01021 
01022       swprintf( WORLDTIMESTR, L"%s %d, %02d:%02d", pDayStrings[ 0 ], guiDay, guiHour, guiMin );
01023 
01024       if( !gfBasement && !gfCaves )
01025             gfDoLighting             = TRUE;
01026 
01027       return( TRUE );
01028 }

01030 
01031 void CreateMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( INT16 sX, INT16 sY )
01032 {
01033       if( fClockMouseRegionCreated == FALSE )
01034       {
01035             // create a mouse region for pausing of game clock
01036             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gClockMouseRegion, (UINT16)( sX ), (UINT16)( sY ),(UINT16)( sX + CLOCK_REGION_WIDTH ), (UINT16)( sY + CLOCK_REGION_HEIGHT ), MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
01037                                            MSYS_NO_CURSOR, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, PauseOfClockBtnCallback );
01038             
01039             fClockMouseRegionCreated = TRUE;
01040 
01041             if ( gfGamePaused == FALSE )
01042             {
01043                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gClockMouseRegion, pPausedGameText[ 2 ] );
01044             }
01045             else
01046             {
01047                   SetRegionFastHelpText( &gClockMouseRegion, pPausedGameText[ 1 ] );
01048             }
01049       }
01050 }
01051 
01052 
01053 void RemoveMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( void )
01054 {
01055       // remove pause region
01056       if( fClockMouseRegionCreated == TRUE )
01057       {
01058             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gClockMouseRegion );
01059             fClockMouseRegionCreated = FALSE;
01060 
01061       }
01062 }

01064 
01065 void PauseOfClockBtnCallback( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01066 {
01067       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01068       {
01069             HandlePlayerPauseUnPauseOfGame(  );
01070       }
01071 }
01072 
01073 
01074 void HandlePlayerPauseUnPauseOfGame( void )
01075 {
01076       if ( gTacticalStatus.uiFlags & ENGAGED_IN_CONV )
01077       {
01078             return;
01079       }
01080 
01081       // check if the game is paused BY THE PLAYER or not and reverse
01082       if( gfGamePaused && gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause )
01083       {
01084             // If in game screen...
01085             if ( guiCurrentScreen == GAME_SCREEN )
01086             {
01087                   if( giTimeCompressMode == TIME_COMPRESS_X0 )
01088                   {
01089                         giTimeCompressMode++;
01090                   }
01091 
01092                   // ATE: re-render
01093                   SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01094             }
01095 
01096             UnPauseGame( );
01097             PauseTime( FALSE );
01098             gfIgnoreScrolling = FALSE;
01099             gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause = FALSE;
01100       }
01101       else
01102       {
01103             // pause game
01104             PauseGame( );
01105             PauseTime( TRUE );
01106             gfIgnoreScrolling = TRUE;
01107             gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause = TRUE;
01108       }
01109 
01110       return;
01111 }
01112 
01113 
01114 void CreateDestroyScreenMaskForPauseGame( void )
01115 {
01116       static BOOLEAN fCreated = FALSE;
01117       INT16 sX = 0, sY = 0;
01118 
01119       if( ( ( fClockMouseRegionCreated == FALSE ) || ( gfGamePaused == FALSE ) || ( gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause == FALSE ) ) && ( fCreated == TRUE ) )
01120       {
01121             fCreated = FALSE;
01122             MSYS_RemoveRegion( &gClockScreenMaskMouseRegion );
01123             RemoveMercPopupBoxFromIndex( iPausedPopUpBox );
01124             iPausedPopUpBox = -1;
01125             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01126             fTeamPanelDirty = TRUE;
01127             fMapPanelDirty = TRUE;
01128             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
01129             gfJustFinishedAPause = TRUE;
01130             MarkButtonsDirty();
01131             SetRenderFlags( RENDER_FLAG_FULL );
01132       }
01133       else if( (gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause == TRUE ) && ( fCreated == FALSE ) )
01134       {
01135             // create a mouse region for pausing of game clock
01136             MSYS_DefineRegion( &gClockScreenMaskMouseRegion, 0, 0 ,SCREEN_WIDTH, SCREEN_HEIGHT , MSYS_PRIORITY_HIGHEST,
01137                                            0, MSYS_NO_CALLBACK, ScreenMaskForGamePauseBtnCallBack );
01138             fCreated = TRUE;
01139 
01140             // get region x and y values
01141             sX = ( &gClockMouseRegion ) -> RegionTopLeftX;
01142             sY = ( &gClockMouseRegion ) -> RegionTopLeftY;
01143       
01144             //re create region on top of this
01145             RemoveMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( );
01146             CreateMouseRegionForPauseOfClock( sX, sY );
01147 
01148             SetRegionFastHelpText( &gClockMouseRegion, pPausedGameText[ 1 ] );
01149 
01150             fMapScreenBottomDirty = TRUE;
01151 
01152             //UnMarkButtonsDirty( );
01153 
01154             // now create the pop up box to say the game is paused
01155             iPausedPopUpBox = PrepareMercPopupBox ( iPausedPopUpBox ,BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BACKGROUND, BASIC_MERC_POPUP_BORDER, pPausedGameText[ 0 ], 300, 0, 0, 0, &usPausedActualWidth, &usPausedActualHeight );
01156       }
01157 }
01158 
01159 
01160 void ScreenMaskForGamePauseBtnCallBack( MOUSE_REGION * pRegion, INT32 iReason )
01161 {
01162       if (iReason & MSYS_CALLBACK_REASON_LBUTTON_UP)
01163       {
01164             // unpause the game
01165             HandlePlayerPauseUnPauseOfGame( );
01166       }
01167 }
01168 
01169 void RenderPausedGameBox( void )
01170 {
01171       if( ( gfPauseDueToPlayerGamePause == TRUE ) && ( gfGamePaused == TRUE ) && ( iPausedPopUpBox != -1 ) )
01172       {
01173             RenderMercPopUpBoxFromIndex( iPausedPopUpBox, ( INT16 )( 320 - usPausedActualWidth / 2 ), ( INT16 )( 200 - usPausedActualHeight / 2 ), FRAME_BUFFER );
01174             InvalidateRegion( ( INT16 )( 320 - usPausedActualWidth / 2 ), ( INT16 )( 200 - usPausedActualHeight / 2  ), ( INT16 )( 320 - usPausedActualWidth / 2 + usPausedActualWidth ), ( INT16 )( 200 - usPausedActualHeight / 2 + usPausedActualHeight ) );
01175       }
01176 
01177       // reset we've just finished a pause by the player
01178       gfJustFinishedAPause = FALSE;
01179 }
01180 
01181 BOOLEAN DayTime()
01182 { //between 7AM and 9PM
01183       return ( guiHour >= 7 && guiHour < 21 );
01184 }
01185 
01186 BOOLEAN NightTime()
01187 {  //before 7AM or after 9PM
01188       return ( guiHour < 7 || guiHour >= 21 );
01189 }

01192 
01193 void ClearTacticalStuffDueToTimeCompression( void )
01194 {
01195       // is this test the right thing?  ARM
01196       if ( guiTacticalInterfaceFlags & INTERFACE_MAPSCREEN )
01197       {
01198             // clear tactical event queue
01199             ClearEventQueue( );
01200 
01201             // clear tactical message queue
01202             ClearTacticalMessageQueue( );
01203 
01204             if( gfWorldLoaded )
01205             {
01206                   // clear tactical actions
01207                   CencelAllActionsForTimeCompression( );
01208             }
01209       }
01210 }
